alert.note: Alert for Trigg (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 31 at 10:48PM EDT until March 31 at 11:15PM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: The National Weather Service in Paducah has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Trigg County in western Kentucky... * Until 1015 PM CDT. * At 948 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Turkey Bay, moving northeast at 85 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Cadiz, Energy Lake Campground, Woodlands Nature Station, Turkey Bay, Land Between The Lakes Area, Golden Pond Visitors Center, Wranglers Campground, Canton and Rockcastle. This includes Interstate 24 in Kentucky between Mile Markers 58 and 69. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CDT for western and south central Kentucky. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
